genresAdvancedInfo.name: old school uk hip hop
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Old school thrash is a subgenre of heavy metal that originated in the early 1980s. It is characterized by fast tempos, aggressive guitar riffs, and powerful vocals. The lyrics often deal with social and political issues, as well as personal struggles. Bands like Metallica, Slayer, and Megadeth are considered pioneers of the genre and have influenced countless other thrash bands.
